title: Three things I want to say
content:
These are three things that I wanted to share with you guys:

(1) today I turn 18 [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img]

(2) I'm in college and it's amazing

(3) the other day I heard about the webcomic XKCD and I checked it out and it's absolutely hilarious - hardcore nerd/math/programming references abound. Incredible. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] Where else could you find comics about regular expressions, LISP, GOTO, factoring, Hamiltonian circuits/paths, the traveling salesman problem, the knapsack problem, the command prompt, cryptography, string theory, Donald Knuth, the Riemann-Zeta function, M.C. Escher, iambic pentameter, the Donner Party, the Poisson distribution, and of course Bill Nye? Seriously, this comic is amazing.

title: Re: Three things I want to say
Re: Three things I want to say
content:
Your mom goes to college.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: Three things I want to say
content:
Well, happy birthday. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img]

Glad you like college...

But comics are tiring... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: cheers
content:
1) Happy mutual birthday. Today I am 23.

3) I discovered xkcd a few months ago, though I don't remember how. 'Tis indeed brilliant. Everyone who hasn't seen it, should go there now (xkcd.com). [img]http://jimage.nfshost.com/plog/photo/queensland__sep_2007_/chesscoaster-web-b.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-disguised.gif[/img]

2) I'm not in college/uni, and it's also great!

title: Re: cheers
content:
Happy birthday guys.--------------------

title: Re: Three things I want to say
content:
Cool! 23. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] It can't be coincidence to be 23... That number is everywhere... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img]

Nice pic Spleen. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Edit: And happy birthday. Garg, I have to edit like every post today, can't remember to say everything.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Three things I want to say
content:
Ha, how'd you get the chessboard onto the ride???

And there is a lot of 23 around at the moment...only a few months to go until I'm not that any more [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] [url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]

title: Re: Three things I want to say
content:
[hr]KeenRush Cool! 23. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] It can't be coincidence to be 23... That number is everywhere... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img]
[hr]Hmm, hasn't been for me. Last night I had a nice 16 sequence, though. Got number 16 at the meat deli, at which point I decided to call it a programmer's dozen and ordered that many sausages for my BBQ, and then I got shifted from register 15 to 16 when checking out. I found that amusing.

[hr]Malvineous Ha, how'd you get the chessboard onto the ride???
[hr]Easier than you'd think. They're not very strict on that coaster, letting you take bags on there as long as they're kept at your feet. Not that there was any foot room--the bag is actually sitting between the two seats.

Strangely enough, the ride broke down just a few minutes after we got out.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img]

The plan was to get a photo on the Wild West ride, but the water was problematic with the Blu-Tack (I didn't feel like wasting a chessboard by actually using super glue, so now I have seven tubes of it... guess I'll start fixing a lot of broken stuff).

content:

title: Re: Three things I want to say
content:
(1) Next February 27th I turn 18.

(2a) I'm in university and it's amazing.
(2b) High scool was also amazing.
(2c) Primary was also amazing.
(2d) Supposedly my birth was also amazing.

(3) (null)------------------------------
